explains: n. 透明，透明性；幻灯片，透明正片；透明度，清晰度，公开度；显而易见，一目了然
wordGroup: transparency international n. 透明国际组织

sentences.en: Cataracts affect the transparency of the eye's lenses.
sentences.cn: 白内障影响眼睛晶状体的透明度。

sentences.en: Overall, the strike is an effort to provide more secondary compensation along with other concerns, such as transparency upon hiring talent and on-set safety precautions.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，这次罢工是为了提供更多的次要补偿，以及其他方面的考虑，比如雇佣人才的透明度和现场安全防范措施。

sentences.en: With information no longer controlled by travel agents or hidden in business networks, the travel industry was revolutionized, as greater transparency helped slash prices.
sentences.cn: 随着信息不再被旅行社控制或是隐藏在商业网络中，旅游业发生了革命性的变化，更大的透明度使价格降低了。
